transforms.code:
connections = value
	totalconnected = len(value)
	active=0
	for row in range(len(connections)):
		connection_status = connections[row]['Status']
		if connection_status:
			  active=active+1
	Database = str(active)+ "/"+ str(totalconnected)+" "+"connected"	
	return Database

value = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	value = len(value)
	return value

sessions = value
	clientcount=0  
	for session in sessions:
	    	client= session.get("sessionScope")
	    	if client != 'designer':
	    		clientcount=clientcount+1
	Perspectives = str(clientcount)+" "+str("Open") 
	return Perspectives

data = value
	count = 0
	for row in range(len(data)):
		if running == 'RUNNING':
			count= count +1
		
	data = str(count)+" "+"Running"
	return data

messageHandlers.script:
Server = payload["Server"]
	try:
		#Fetch Server Details
		System = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getSystemDetails()
		systemPerformance = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getSystemPerformance()
		redundancy = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.Redundancy()
		gatewayVersion = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getGatewayVersion()
		gatewayNetworkConnections = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getGatewayNetworkConnections()
		OPCServers = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getOPCServers()
		Designers = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getDesignersinfo()
		Perspectives = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getPerspectiveinfo()
		Database = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getDatabaseDetails()
		Device = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getDevicesinfo()
		RemoteServers = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getRemoteServers()
		Modules = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getModulesStatus()
		ThreadDump = ServerDetails.ServerDetails.getThreadDump()
		
		#Show Details in Main View
		self.custom.system = System
		self.custom.systemPerformance = systemPerformance
		self.custom.redundancy = redundancy
		self.custom.gatewayVersionList = gatewayVersion
		self.custom.gatewayNetworkConnections = gatewayNetworkConnections
		self.custom.OPCServers = OPCServers
		self.custom.Designers = Designers
		self.custom.PerspectiveDataset = Perspectives
		self.custom.DatabaseDataset = Database
		self.custom.DeviceDataSet = Device
		self.custom.RemoteServersDataset = RemoteServers
		self.custom.ModuleDataset = Modules
		self.custom.ThreadDump = ThreadDump
	except  Exception as e:
		system.perspective.print("Error in call script"+str(e))
